attributes.action: place The Universal Declartion Of Human Rights into every British passport issued.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure the safety and protection of everyone of HM subjects who are abroad, we ask that the PM place a list of all human rights guaranteed by international law under the universal declaration of human rights into every issued British passport. To prosecute each nation that accepts a British subject into there country but violates such rights of a subject, in the international courts. Make the acceptance of a British Subject into a country a legally binding contract that no matter what, that nation must uphold that subjects human rights and if not done so, leaves the forigne government liable under International Law and to a bycott by The UK.
